message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take the majority, but you get a decent starting point. What do you say?
You started with a majority, now it's my turn to try to balance the scales.
Let's meet in the middle.  I'm willing to give up some of my share from the last round, but I still need a good portion to make this worth it for me.  This is my final offer before we lose even more.
I'm not willing to give up too much, but I'll try to meet you halfway. This is my best offer so far.
